ThingDef.Name: QM_HawkML_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Hawl
ThingDef.description: A tomahawk of ancient design repurposed for modern mercenary to use. Due to its lightweight polymer handle, it is relatively well balanced as a melee weapon, but it is unsuitable to be thrown.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_SharvaraPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Sharvara
ThingDef.description:
The Sharvara is a total overhaul of the Hydra pistol. Upgraded with an improved laser attachment and holographic sight for precise accuracy, as well as a new frame and improved internal mechanism. This upgrade of the Hydra is famed for its reliability and lethality on the battlefield, often sought after by elites of the mercenary world.

"In an capitalist utopia, the invisible hand is trigger happy," said the veteran merc

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_RetributionAR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Retribution
ThingDef.description:
The Retribution Pattern assault rifle serves as an emblem of prowess and showcases the unparalleled ballistic precision of Realware™ industries. With a larger magazine and an ultrasensitive hair trigger, the Retribution is able to fire volleys of lead that can match firing squads. 

"In a world where the market dictates the rules of engagement, this rifle guarantees a yield," said the savvy merc

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_GhostMantisSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Ghost-Mantis
ThingDef.description: Ghost Mantis is an elite SMG built for covert operations. With its drum fed bullpup design, the Ghost Mantis provides exceptional agility within tight spaces. It is additionally augmented with an improved laser attachment for precise targeting and an infrared scope for enhanced visibility in low-light conditions.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_HydraPL_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Hydra
ThingDef.description: A sleek firearm designed for precision and versatility. With two distinct burst-fire modes, it offers a concentrated barrage of firepower, giving it unparalleled reliability on the battlefield.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_Hydra24PL_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Hydra-24
ThingDef.description: An enhanced iteration of the classic Hydra pistol, now enhanced with a laser attachment for precise targeting and a red dot sight for improved accuracy. With its dual burst-fire mode and ergonomic design, the Hydra-24 remains the veritable bread and butter of a mercenary arsenal.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_Hydra33SPL_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Hydra-33S
ThingDef.description: A further enhancement of the Hydra pistol, its upgraded frame and improved grip ensure maximum control of the firearm. Equipped with an enhanced laser attachment and upgraded red dot sight, this weapon offers superior precision fit for any self respecting mercenary.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_MantisM3SMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Mantis-M3
ThingDef.description: A tactical SMG designed for silent operations. Featuring an internally silenced barrel, this weapon ensures stealthy engagements without compromising on firepower. Its bullpup design offers exceptional maneuverability in tight spaces, while the inclusion of both two-burst and rapid-fire modes provides versatility in all types of combat scenarios.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_PunishmentAR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Punishment
ThingDef.description: An assault rifle suited for urban combat and open firefights alike. Renowned for its reliability and exceptional control, the Punishment ensures precise and effective firepower for mercenaries in any combat situation.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_HereticSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heretic
ThingDef.description: A double-barrel shotgun built for close range engagements. Known for its reliability and lightweight design, as well as its impressive lethality, the Heretic offers formidable firepower in a compact package.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QM_BeastMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Beast
ThingDef.description: The ultimate multi-barrel minigun, renowned for its reliability and surprisingly lightweight construction given its size and sheer firepower. With rapid-fire capabilities, precise control and easy portability, the Beast delivers a hail of bullets on demand.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
